title: Nintama Rantarō
resume: Rantarō, Shinbei and Kirimaru are ninja  apprentices in the Ninja Gakuen, where first grade ones are called  "Nintamas". They must learn  everything a ninja must know, but as for our heroes, money, food or  playing are more interesting. The series show the everyday adventures of  our heroes.
